data.message: Just a shame wembley fucked up the sound system and many of us could hear you!

replies.message: the sound was only bad when the two acts were on before.. after that it was heard all over?
I couldn't hear fuck all on Saturday
I couldn't hear fuck all on Friday I was gutted!!
The sound on Saturday was ok I could hear everything
From where me and 3 mates were standing you couldn't even tell what song was on ? Disgusting

Fridays sound was bull shit, could barely hear what most songs were, certainly could not hear lyrics.

About half way between front and back, terrible, headed back to get in front of rear speakers, little mid range, but still very very quiet, distorted, masked by reverb and base, SHAMBLES for the price we all paid.
Maybe the sound was not the best, but I did not care...I was at Wembley watching the best rapper around these days...so there was a technical hitch....who cares!!!
It's not Wembley's fault, it's metropolis music'a fault. You would have thought £13m profit and they could have supplied a decent sound system.
The first two acts wernt worth hearing. Eminem was fine audio with me down on the floor
I couldn't hear much. But once I worked out what song EMINEM was rapping, I knew the words n cud just sing along anyway. Ppl are trying 4 refunds. Not me!! Best night OF MY ENTIRE LIFE!!!! 😘😘
You do realise it was eminems own sound crew don't you
